content.question: Which of the following post-1945 developments contributed most strongly to the discomfort that members of SDS felt?

choices.label: The efforts of Congress to adopt legislation to deal with domestic social problems
The disillusionment with United States domestic values and Cold War events
The Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka decision on school desegregation
The support for collective security through international organizations

content.answer: The disillusionment with United States domestic values and Cold War events

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
